DOC.brief_summary: To explore effect induction maintenance anesthesia etomidate hemodynamics oxidative stress diabetic patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Induction Maintenance Anesthesia With Etomidate Hemodynamics Oxidative Stress Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 65 year ; Diabetic patient prepare elective surgery ; Body mass index 16 30 kg/m2 ; Blood glucose 8.3 mmol/kg oral antidiabetic agent diet control ; American Society Anesthesiology ( ASA ) Physical Status : Ⅰ Ⅱ ; Expected operation duration 2 8 h ; Signed informed consent form . Severe cardiac , cerebral , liver , kidney , lung , endocrine disease infectious disease ; Chemotherapy immunotherapy surgery ; Allergy trial drug contraindication ; Expected history difficult airway ; Suspected abuse narcotic analgesia ; Diseases neuromuscular system ; Mentally unstable mental illness ; Trend malignant hyperthermia ; Pregnant breastfeed woman ; Attendance trial past 30 day .
